In India there is an enormous gap between healthcare supply and demand. What do you think are the major steps that can be taken by the government to improve patient care in the country?

              In India the healthcare system is good growing.In my view government should provide better facilities in order to improve these healthcare systems.

                   In India many Healthcare systems are located.Bt I think that most of them are not performing correct job.patients should be handled with care.Most of the hospitals are performing their job for the sake of money.Most of the Doctors in some hospitals are treating patients even they know that they are expired.Bt they are treating for the sake of money.If a patient admits in hospital with some accident case or for some other reason 1st they ask details instead of treating the patient.I think that patient should be given more importance than details.

                    Government should take some major steps to improve these healthcare systems.They should employ some campaigns, free healthcare services so that poor people can utilise those services.Government should mainly focus on availability of doctors.Banks should provide loan facilities.In hospitals free medicines should be provided.Government should provide abundance of ambulance services,increments in salary level of every individual.Hospitals should provide insurance services for the patients.Hospitals should be established both in urban and rural areas.Government should ensure that white card holders should be provided with good healthcare services.

                    Finally,i would like to conclude that Government should provide better services for the people and improve the patient care in the country.
